rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a given mso:skiing.ski_lift. Type, manufacturer, capacity, and dated of building and removal are included in this relationship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lift tenure

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The lift's capacity (per carrier, not total) during this period.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Capacity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date this lift was built.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date built

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date this lift was removed or destroyed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date removed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The type of lift used during this period.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lift type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The company that manufactured this lift.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Manufacturer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of types of ski lift. Ski lifts are the cabled devices that carry skiers up a hill. The three major types of lifts are aerial lifts, surface lifts, and cable railways.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lift type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship type collecting the data on an mso:skiing.ski_area's mso:skiing.ski_lifts. This includes the type and number of those types in this area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lift Type Breakdown

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.lift_type_breakdown to an mso:skiing.lift_type found in the area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lift Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.lift_type_breakdown to the number of a given mso:skiing.lift_type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Enumeration type representing the kinds of ski run ratings used to describe the difficulty of a given mso:skiing.ski_run, like beginner, expert, and intermediate.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Run rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Symbol displayed visually at the ski run site and in literature and maps to indicate rating of difficulty.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Symbol

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all ski run rating symbols.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Run rating symbol

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all ski areas. Ski areas are the mountainous areas where there are ski trails and supporting services such as hotels, restaurants, and ski lifts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Area

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Lowest elevation of the skiable area (in meters).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Base elevation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The closest city to this ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Closest city

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: If this ski area is no longer active, the date it closed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Closing Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the mso:skiing.lift_type_breakdown, the relationship containing data for the different types and numbers of mso:skiing.ski_lifts in the area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lift Type Breakdown

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Ski lifts used in this ski area, both present and historical.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lifts

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the text description of its ski lifts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lists Description

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Ski lodges in this ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lodges

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the length of the longest run.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Longest Run

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the average time to travel down the longest run.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Longest Run Time

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the number of lifts available in the area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lifts

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The total number of ski runs in this ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of runs

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the lowest amount of snow for the area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lowest Depth Onslope

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the number of days the area was open for a given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Open Days for a Year

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the percentage rate that the ski area is open.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Open Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date this ski area first opened.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opening Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Past and present owners of this ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Owners

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the prices of the passes the area accepts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Pass Pricing

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the mso:common.pricing_relationship that contains the data of the area's lift ticket prices during the peak season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Peak Lift Ticket Prices

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the mso: relationship that collects data on the level of difficulty of the ski runs and their numbers for the area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Runs by Difficulty

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the mso:skiing.ski_pass the area accepts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Pass

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The total skiable area of this ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Skiable area

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Yearly amount of snowfall in a season (in centimeters with a start and end date for each season measured).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Snowfall

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown for the area. The data includes the total number of terrain parks and the number open.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Terrain Park Breakdown

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Highest elevation of the skiable area (in meters).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Top elevation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.skiing.ski_area to the number of open lifts. This is the total number of open lifts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Total Open Lifts

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area to the resort's uphill capacity. This is the number of skiers that can be transported to the top of the mountain at given time. This number is people per hour.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Uphill Capacity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_resort to the resort's published vertical rise. Vertical rise is the difference in elevation between the top and bottom terminals of the resort's ski lift.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vertical Rise
Ski Area Owner
rdf:Description.mso:type.type.deprecation_info: There is no need to reify owners of ski areas. Use event.agent instead. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:event.agent]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date after which this person or organization no longer owned the ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: End date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The person or organization that owns or owned this ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Owner

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date at which this person or organization first owned the ski area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Start date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data on an mso:skiing.ski_area's mso:skiing.ski_runs. This includes the numbers of the runs by difficulty type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Area Run Breakdown Relationship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area_run_difficulty to the mso:common.difficulty_level of the runs.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Difficulty

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area_run_difficulty to the number of runs at the given mso:common.difficulty_level.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area_run_difficulty to the number of open runs of this difficulty level for the mso:skiing.ski_area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number Open

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area_run_difficulty relationship to the total length of the runs for the given difficulty level.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Total Length

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.ski_area_run_difficulty relationship to the total length of the open runs for the given difficulty level.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Total Open Length

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all ski lifts. Ski lifts are the cabled devices that carry skiers up a hill.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Lift

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The elevation at the base of the lift.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Base Elevation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The type of lift this is.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lift type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The ski run or ski runs served by this lift.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Runs served

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The elevation at the top of the lift.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Top Elevation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all ski lift manufacturers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Lift Manufacturer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all ski lodges. Ski lodges are the hotels in ski resorts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Lodge

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Restaurants in this lodge
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Restaurants

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all ski passes. Ski passes are the passes issued for mso:ski_areas that offer discounted prices on lift tickets.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Pass

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all ski runs. Ski runs are the paths down a mountain for skiing or snowboarding.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski Run

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date this ski run was closed permanently
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date closed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date this ski run was first opened
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date opened

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The difficulty rating of this ski run.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The ski area that this ski run is in
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ski area

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting data on a mso:skiing.ski_area's terrain parks. Terrain parks are the is an outdoor recreation area containing terrain that allows skiers, snowboarders and snowbikers to perform tricks.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Terrain Park Breakdown

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown to the total number of terrain parks the mso:skiing.ski_area contains.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Total

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown to the number of half-pipes in the terrain parks.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Half-Pipes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown to the total number of half pipes open in the mso:skiing.ski_area's terrain parks.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Open Half Pipes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown to the total number of jumps in the mso:skiing.ski_area's terrain parks.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Jumps

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown to the total number of rails in the mso:skiing.ski_area's terrain parks.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Rails

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown to the total number of rails open in the mso:skiing.ski_area's terrain parks.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Open Rails

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:skiing.terrain_park_breakdown to the number of open terrain parks for mso:skiing.ski_area.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Open

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Value type collecting the data for an mso:skiing.ski_area's yearly snowfall.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Yearly Snowfall

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Date of the end of the season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Season end

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Date of the start of the season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Season start

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Yearly amount of snowfall (in centimeters).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Snowfall
